example.eg: She hung a picture above the fireplace.
example.egtrans: 她在壁炉上方挂了一幅画。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的上方, 超过，多于，在…之上, 优于，优先于

example.eg: A general ranks above a colonel.
example.egtrans: 将军的军衔高于上校。

example.eg: The temperature in Rio de Janeiro goes above 40 degrees in the summer.
example.egtrans: 夏天时，里约热内卢的气温超过40度。

example.eg: I keep non-fiction on the bottom shelf, and fiction on the one above.
example.egtrans: 我将纪实作品放在书架底层并将小说作品放在书架上层。

example.eg: This measure affects middle managers and above.
example.egtrans: 这条举措影响到中层及以上的管理人员。

example.eg: This product should not be used at temperatures of thirty degrees and above.
example.egtrans: 本产品不应于30摄氏度或以上的环境下使用。

example.eg: This event is described in more detail above.
example.egtrans: 前文曾对此事件进行过详细描述。

example.eg: Water was leaking from the floor above.
example.egtrans: 水正从上面的地板往下漏。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在上方的, 在较高处的

example.eg: The above examples demonstrate how common the problem is.
example.egtrans: 上述例子证明了该问题的普遍性。

example.eg: The scene is a family's living room, with a dining table above and armchairs below.
example.egtrans: 舞台场景为一家人的起居室，后部放着一张餐桌，前部放着几把扶手椅。

example.eg: Sea trout: grey above with black dots on dorsal fin, silvery below.
example.egtrans: 海鳟鱼：鱼背呈灰色，背鳍上还有黑色斑点，鱼肚成银色。

example.eg: It was like a gift from the Lord above.
This situation is more complex than stated above.
These orders have come from above.
example.egtrans: 这些指令是高层传达的。

example.eg: Heavy snowfall overnight has left the road impassable. In light of the above, we have decided to close the office.
example.egtrans: 彻夜的大雪让道路无法通行。鉴于上文所述情形，我们决定关闭办公室。

example.eg: Oregon is just above California.
example.egtrans: 俄勒冈州就在加利福尼亚州的北方。

example.eg: I prefer ice cream above chocolate.
example.egtrans: 跟巧克力相比，我更愿意吃冰淇淋。

example.eg: I couldn't hear my phone above the noise in the restaurant.
example.egtrans: 餐厅太吵，我都没听到电话响。

example.eg: He's above lying about such things.
example.egtrans: 他不屑于就那种事撒谎。

example.eg: All this talk of economics is above me.
example.egtrans: 这些经济方面的讨论对我来说太复杂了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 超出…的理解范围, 对…来说太复杂

example.eg: Prudence hoped she could rise above the petty gossip and narrow-minded behavior of those in the neighborhood.
He's very tall and towers above everyone else.
He is a cut above the rest.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 优于, 比…更好, 比…略胜一筹

example.eg: This restaurant is definitely a cut above; they have embroidered tablecloths.
Above all, Louise wants to become a nurse.
example.egtrans: 最重要的是，露易丝想要成为一名护士。

dsense.name: above all, above any other, above all others

example.eg: Peter is a clever, handsome and, above all, honest man.
example.egtrans: 彼得头脑聪慧、外表英俊，以及最重要的是还很诚实。

example.eg: Above all else, the company must make a profit.
She always goes above and beyond what is expected of her.
example.egtrans: 她总是超出人们对她的期待。

dsense.name: above and beyond the call of duty, beyond the call of duty

example.eg: He was honored for performing above and beyond the call of duty.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 超出职责范围, 超越工作要求

example.eg: You need to have an above-average IQ to answer these questions correctly.
Our neighbors have an above-ground swimming pool.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 高于地面的, 在地面上的

example.eg: We tried a new restaurant tonight and thought the food was above par for the price.
Some would say politicians are above suspicion. Others would vehemently argue the opposite.
Many politicians think that they are above the law, and should not be punished for any wrongdoing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 凌驾于法律之上的，不受法律约束的
线上项目的，经常预算的

dsense.name: above-the-line
dsense.guideword: figurative (advertising: in mass media) (广告业：大众传媒)

dsense.name: above the line
dsense.guideword: figurative (advertising: in mass media) (广告业：大众传媒)

example.eg: In this economy, many families have trouble staying above water after paying all of their monthly expenses.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无债务地, 未陷入财务危机

example.eg: He likes to keep his business dealings aboveboard.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 诚实的, 不欺瞒的, 光明正大的

example.eg: Be assured, I always operate aboveboard.
The above-mentioned changes will be in effect until the end of the month.
example.egtrans: 直至月末，上述变更方可生效。

example.eg: Melinda worked hard to get above the minimum academic requirements for university.
We should get above 5,000 feet before we make camp.

dsense.name: be head and shoulders above [sb/sth], stand head and shoulders above [sb/sth]

example.eg: George's essay was head and shoulders above those of the rest of the class.
example.egtrans: 乔治的作文远远胜过班上其他学生的作文。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 远远胜过, 远远优于

example.eg: I've never actually seen the Grand Canyon up close, I've only seen it from high above in an airplane.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 勉强维持, 惨谈经营

example.eg: The athlete trains for 2 hours per day, and that's over and above his practice sessions with teammates.

dsense.name: punch above your weight
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (do more than you are capable of)

example.eg: Really? You've been promoted to head of department? Are you sure you aren't punching above your weight?
Have you seen Jim's new girlfriend? She's gorgeous and she has a PhD; I reckon he's punching above his weight there!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 约会自己配不上的对象

example.eg: Dawn occurs when the sun rises above the horizon.
